column2: I ordered the soup of the day which was the corn chowder. They need to put that bad boy permanently on their menu. It was one of the better corn chowders I have tasted. If it's available the day you dine here
column3: give it a try especially if you're a fan of chowder like myself. Another app we ordered was the Malnati salad. Our waitress said that this was a great choice even though in the back of my mind I was questioning: how salads can be possibly that great? Little did I know that the Malnati salad lived up to her words. Whether it was the potent and effective gorgonzola cheese or their classic Lou's dressing
column4: the bowl was spotless after we were done with it. The medium size was more than enough to share between two people.
